data.name: Midwest 90: Rapid City
data.detailed_description:
Experience the STRUGGLE FOR SURVIVAL from a management perspective like in Frostpunk, but in this case - through the eyes of a restaurant owner in a small town under siege by monsters.

• Make management decisions that tip the balance between SURVIVING MONSTERS ATTACKS and MAKING PROFITS.

• Keep your business running and the locals happy by sustaining the TOWN’S ECONOMY.

• Setup SYNERGETIC TRAPS outside the restaurant to fend off unpredictable monsters incursions at NIGHT.

• Unravel the mystery behind the monsters by diving into a deep narrative with remarkable characters.

Feel Free to join our Discord and Facebook for more updates!
Discord: https://discord.gg/Bu96PA9VhZ
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/midwest90.rapidcity
Demo:https://www.gameround.co/detail/208/info/EN

data.short_description: Midwest 90: Rapid City is a single player, narrative focused survival- tycoon PC game, where the player Builds and Protects their restaurant that serves Monster Meat Dishes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 980
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 980
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes: There will some cartoon like monster violence
